Articles.Content:
Here she is

The new Archangel Class Battle Cruiser [Gen 6]

http://i.imgur.com/uAYfAx4.png

Improvements include:

12 extra I beam missiles bringing her to a total or 20 I beam missiles and 4 Probeteck SRB Missiles

A firefall weapon system

and One extra engine (the 215 power one)

Now weighing in at 105 tons and has 514 parts (most are from the weapons so part count will drop)

Spartwo sense you were the only one that played I ll let you have the first download when it is finished.

archangel's really buffed out, nice!

archangel's really buffed out, nice!

Its to bad all people want to do are light weight battles.

Last time she saw any action was right Camulus777 started having computer problems

Its to bad all people want to do are light weight battles.

Last time she saw any action was right Camulus777 started having computer problems

I'm down for a battle, what's her tonnage? She's probably XIV weight

I'm down for a battle, what's her tonnage? She's probably XIV weight

Answer: ...

Now weighing in at 105 tons and has 514 parts

You think you've got weight problems.

...this one is made of 532 parts, and weighs over 200 tons.

Stratagem Armour and Paperwork are a company dedicated to producing high-quality armoured fighting vehicles for all your combat needs.

The conflict has attracted our attention due to the potential for large-scale ground operations to be launched, and with both HKA and GMI being relatively inexperienced in designing armoured ground vehicles, being mining companies and having focused largely on the war in space thus far.

We support the highest bidder, which in this case happens to be GMI.

Of course, all products are fully certified for all Health and Safety Executive directives, and the company itself is fully ISO 9001 certified.

As such, all potential failings of the designs or crew training programme are to be reported directly to the Quality Assurance department, unless they refer directly to Health and Safety legislation, in which case they are to be reported to the Health and Safety control group. All such reports are taken extremely seriously and are definitely forwarded straight to the relevant task group, and all rumours of reports being passed around through multiple managers with conflicting roles are completely untrue.

I have three tanks for you at the moment, and four more built and awaiting screenshotting/uploading.

EDIT: Now there are eight, with addition of the Cuboria, three marks of the Tillinghast and the Walther.

Firestorm Heavy Assault Tank Mk I (Ground vehicle, Heavy)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/d3f83ffp6zx1uzk/Firestorm%20Heavy%20Assault%20Tank%20Mk%20I.craft?dl=0

Javascript is disabled. View full album

199 parts, total crew of 5. Designed as a main battle tank for frontline combat.

In accordance with HSE Directive #422 "Fatigue Levels and Armoured Fighting Vehicles", paragraph 5b, all crew are to have a 5 minute rest and relaxation break for every hour of travel or combat. Failure to comply with this directive may result in investigation by the Executive and possible loss of the licence to use such vehicles in the future.

Warranty void if used against fortifications or heavy defences.

Firestorm Heavy Assault Tank Mk II (Ground vehicle, Heavy)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/qqdycvejjhuzs56/Firestorm%20Heavy%20Assault%20Tank%20Mk%20II.craft?dl=0

Javascript is disabled. View full album

211 parts, total crew of 5. Designed as a mobile armoured missile platform.

Standing directly in front of a missile as it is fired would be highly inadvisable, as it would breach Directive #351 "Missiles, Particulates and Lung Health", paragraph h, and could cause long-term respiratory disorders.

In addition, Directive #524 "Firing Arcs and Nearby Vehicles", paragraph d, stipulates that no missiles should be fired at a target with an allied vehicle within 25m of the target at any angle, or at any range along the path the missile will take to the target (including 500m beyond the target in case of overshoot). Failure to comply will result in a negative note in the post-combat safety report, and the potential loss of the allied vehicle.

Warranty void if used against aircraft.

Firestorm Heavy Assault Tank Mk III (Ground vehicle, Heavy)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/wekzhs7z1lew2g8/Firestorm%20Heavy%20Assault%20Tank%20Mk%20III.craft?dl=0

Javascript is disabled. View full album

208 parts, total crew of 5. Designed as an armoured assault gun for breaching defences.

Please remember the destructive power of the weapon: as per Directive #122 "High-calibre Weaponry and Explosive Radius", paragraph a, no target under 25m is to be engaged with the main gun. Failure to comply will result in a full investigation, a highly negative post-combat safety report, and ammunition storage explosion with the loss of all crew.

Warranty void if used against light armour.

Tillinghast Light Responder Tank Mk I (Ground vehicle, Light)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/28hlh2gm5hwaw9t/Tillinghast%20Light%20Responder%20Tank%20Mk%20I.craft?dl=0

Javascript is disabled. View full album

127 parts, total crew of 1. Designed as a rapid response unit and a combat scout.

As per Directive #196 "High Speed, Lighning and Time Travel", users are advised not to travel over 88mph in thunderstorms.

Warranty void if stabilisers are disengaged.

Tillinghast Light Responder Tank Mk II (Ground vehicle, Light)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/lrch9u3yfuv0pn6/Tillinghast%20Light%20Responder%20Tank%20Mk%20II.craft?dl=0

Javascript is disabled. View full album

128 parts, total crew of 1. Designed as a rapid response missile carrier.

All directives applicable both to the Tillinghast Mk I and the Firestorm Mk II are to be followed. In addition, due to the mobile nature of the vehicle and the missile capacity, Directive #113 "Crashes, Stored Explosives and You", speed is to be restricted while missiles are loaded except in emergencies. Because of the risk of explosion, missiles are not to be fired while the rocket engines are in use.

Warranty void if missiles run out.

Tillinghast Light Responder Tank Mk III (Ground vehicle, Light)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/7aguctmhfn6c1wd/Tillinghast%20Light%20Responder%20Tank%20Mk%20III.craft?dl=0

Javascript is disabled. View full album

121 parts, total crew of 1. Designed as a rapid response tank with a more powerful weapon.

Please note that the gun is incapable of being rotated. As such, Directive #463 "Fixed Weaponry, Restrictions and Limitations" should be read and memorised before engaging in combat.

Warranty void if gun is turned.

Walther Emergency Combat Rover Mk I (Ground vehicle, Super-light)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/fwn2p3hu39j58h6/Walther%20Emergency%20Combat%20Rover%20Mk%20I.craft?dl=0

Javascript is disabled. View full album

28 parts, crew of 1 but can be operated unmanned. Designed as a cheap defensive rover in case of emergencies.

The Health and Safety departments reminds all employees that the Walther is not "cute" or a "midget tank". It is a dangerous fighting machine. Any reports of ribbons being tied around the guns or spray paint on the gun shield will be dealt with severely. In addition, as the Walther is not a main combat tank, Directive #947 "Rules of Engagement Supplement on Armed Non-combat and Semi-combat Vehicles" is to be followed at all times.

Warranty void if used in combat without a valid emergency.

Cuboria Mobile Defensive Station Mk I (Ground vehicle, Heavy)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/seqyzifofdpprah/Cuboria%20Mobile%20Defensive%20Station%20Mk%20I.craft?dl=0

Javascript is disabled. View full album

218 parts, total crew of 1. Designed as a defensive position to protect vulnerable areas when more permenant defences cannot be constructed.

As the Cuboria is a defensive structure, albeit a mobile one, and not a fighting vehicle in its own right, the standard Rules of Engagement (Directive #24, supplemented in Directives #43, #127, #428, #779, #947) as directed at vehicles and their crew do not apply, but the Rules of Engagement as directed at defensive structures and missile emplacements do apply. However, if the vehicle is attacked while in transit to another location, the RoE for vehicles applies, as the Cuboria is being used as a vehicle rather than a defensive structure.

Warranty void if used as a vehicle in combat.

Walther with Lander (Ground vehicle, Super-light, Lander included)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/s60uidhnjvkagtu/Walther%20with%20Lander.craft?dl=0

Javascript is disabled. View full album

242 parts, total crew of 1. Designed as a way to transport the Walther Emergency Combat Rover to distant bases on other planets.

The Lander is capable of transporting the Walther to distant planets (with refuelling), but is not armoured for combat. Because of this, Directive #43 "Rules of Engagement Supplement on Non-Combat and Unarmed Semi-Combat Vehicles" applies to the lander. Directive #947 still applies to the Walther itself.

Warranty void if landed in a combat area or into enemy territory.

Full download (all craft files, including the ones not currently posted, and the logo part)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/t5mrau15kno3nb9/HatBat_Files.zip?dl=0

{Updated to include the Walther, Tillinghast, Cuboria and Walther with Lander}

Enjoy the craft!

Edited November 16, 2014 by somebody1212
Walther with Lander added.
